attributes.action: Abolish fuel duty & tax for fuel used by the emergency services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When I heard yesterday that our local health authority had to pay the same price for fuel to use in ambulances as we pay for our cars, & that every 1p increase in fuel took thousands of pounds away from it's budget I was appalled.I call for the government to levy no vat or duty for fuel used by any of our emergency services.
